title: Dark Space 2 - Atmospheric Sci-Fi Music Collection
description: A collection of dark, atmospheric sci-fi music tracks and soundscapes.
longDescription:
This music collection will be perfect for space themed or cyberpunk game. Dark vibes will help you achieve a feeling of loneliness perfect for survival horror, RPG, story driven action game and more.

Every track in this collection have an alternative version (marked as "AV") with subtle differences in sounding or arrangement.


YOUTUBE DEMO

SOUNDCLOUD DEMO


Ready to go:

Full tracks and loops included.


Safe to use:

All of my music is royalty free and streaming friendly. You can be sure that streamers will not get copyright claim from YouTube, Twitch, etc. while streaming your game with my music.


Check my other Cyberpunk/Sci-Fi music packs:

Taurus One - Atmospheric Sci-Fi Music Collection
